News.Title: Nagarjuna Agri-Tech Board Meet on Feb 5 for Q3 Results
News.Summary: Nagarjuna Agri-Tech Limited has scheduled a board meeting on February 05, 2026, to consider Q3FY26 unaudited financial results and appoint Mr. Biswanath Bhattacharya as CEO.

News.Title: Agri-Tech India Reports Q3 FY26 Loss of ₹59.37 Lakhs
News.Summary: Agri-Tech India Limited posted a net loss of ₹59.37 lakhs for Q3 FY26 compared to ₹11.02 lakhs loss in Q3 FY25, despite revenue growth of 72.03% to ₹4.92 lakhs.

News.Title: Nagarjuna Agri-Tech Extends Acquisition Timeline
News.Summary: Nagarjuna Agri-Tech Limited extends acquisition deadline for Kathleen Confectioners and Kathleen Food Private Limited to March 31, 2026, citing unforeseen circumstances and procedural requirements.

News.Title: Agri-Tech India Board Meet Set for Jan 30, 2026
News.Summary: Agri-Tech (India) Limited has scheduled a board meeting on January 30, 2026, to consider and approve unaudited financial results for Q3 FY26 and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Tapovan Paper Acquires 2.20% Stake in Agri-Tech
News.Summary: Tapovan Paper and Board Mills Limited acquired 1,30,512 equity shares (2.20%) of Agri-Tech (India) Limited through a scheme of amalgamation approved by NCLT on November 26, 2025.

News.Title: Agri-Tech India faces ₹25L NCALT penalty order
News.Summary: Agri-Tech (India) Limited receives NCALT penalty order of ₹25,00,000 in CIRP proceedings against Techindia Nirman Limited, impacting company finances with equivalent loss amount.

News.Title: Agri-Tech (India) Limited Company Secretary Changes Name Due to Marriage
News.Summary: Agri-Tech (India) Limited announced that Company Secretary and Compliance Officer Ms. Reshma Naresh Talbani has changed her name to Mrs. Meher Amit Rajani following her marriage, effective immediately. Mrs. Rajani, who has been with the company since January 24, 2013, continues in her role with extensive experience in secretarial matters, Companies Act, and SEBI LODR regulations.

News.Title: Agri-Tech India Reports Net Loss of Rs 7.96 Lakhs for Half Year Ended September 2025
News.Summary: Agri-Tech (India) Limited posted a net loss of Rs 7.96 lakhs for the half year ended September 30, 2025, with revenue from operations at Rs 14.95 lakhs, while facing ongoing recovery proceedings for advances worth Rs 894.13 lakhs against Techindia Nirman Limited. The company's auditors issued a qualified opinion citing non-compliance with interest charging provisions and uncertainty over recovery of Rs 2505.20 lakhs interest claim filed with NCLT.

News.Title: Agri-Tech (India) Limited Independent Director Vadla Nagabhushanam Steps Down After Tenure Completion
News.Summary: Agri-Tech (India) Limited announced that Mr. Vadla Nagabhushanam ceased to be an Independent Director effective October 30, 2025, following the completion of his first term on October 29, 2025. The resolution for his re-appointment was not approved by shareholders at the Annual General Meeting held on September 19, 2025. The Board and Management expressed appreciation for his contributions, guidance, and services during his tenure as Independent Director. Mr. Nagabhushanam also served as a member of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.
